item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, May 16, 2025 at 3:10 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Baby is healed with first personalized gene-editing treatment (587 points | 260 comments)

3. Teal – A statically-typed dialect of Lua (52 points | 33 comments)

7. Tek – A music making program for 24-bit Unicode terminals (94 points | 12 comments)

28. Coinbase says hackers bribed staff to steal customer data, demanding $20M ransom (302 points | 339 comments)
